svg.style: left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 100%; height: 100%; display: block; min-width: 926px; min-height: 625px; background-color: #f8f9fa;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1720px; height: 1px; padding-top: 40px; margin-left: -138px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 32px; font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: #333333; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Waterfall SDLC Plan for StockSync Inventory System

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 257px; height: 1px; padding-top: 175px; margin-left: -92px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; color: white; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
1. Planning
- Define Project Scope & Goals for StockSync
- Identify Stakeholders (Warehouse Manager, Clerks)
- Create Detailed Project Plan & Timeline
- Allocate Budget and Resources

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 257px; height: 1px; padding-top: 267px; margin-left: 257px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; color: white; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
2. Analysis
- Conduct interviews to gather ALL system requirements
- Document requirements for all features (User Roles, Product Management, Stock Tracking, etc.)
- Produce final 'Software Requirements Specification' document

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 226px; height: 1px; padding-top: 378px; margin-left: 608px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; color: white; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
5. Testing
- Design the complete System Architecture
- Database Schema (ERD)
- Design UI/UX Mockups for every screen
- Conduct Performance & Security Testing
- Conduct User Acceptance Testing (UAT) with stakeholders

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 226px; height: 1px; padding-top: 480px; margin-left: 906px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; color: white; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
4. Development
- Write all backend and frontend code based on the Design Spec
- Implement the complete database as a whole
- Integrate all parts of application as a whole

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 226px; height: 1px; padding-top: 544px; margin-left: 1195px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; color: white; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
6. Implementation
- Prepare production servers and deploy the final application
- Migrate existing inventory data into the new system
- Conduct training sessions for all users

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 226px; height: 1px; padding-top: 692px; margin-left: 1494px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; color: white; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
7. Maintenance
- Begin ongoing support period
- Fix any bugs discovered post-launch
- Handle user feedback and formal change requests
- Perform regular system updates
